GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves a review with specific id

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for review with specific id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

POST api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an adding new comment in comments table

PATCH api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an updating the votes property of the review with specified id
